name: Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games (3DS/DS)
name_original: Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games (3DS/DS)
description:
Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games (3DS/DS) is a family sports-arcade game developed by Behaviour Interactive. It was originally released in 2012. Activision Blizzard published the game. Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games (3DS/DS) has a Metascore of 43, based on professional reviews.
Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games (3DS/DS) is available on Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo DS. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop.
